00047 void ArrayFileWriterTest::testCreation()

00052 
00053 void ArrayFileWriterTest::testmethod_WriteFile()
00054 {
00055         ArrayData array1;
00056 
00057         array1.CreatedBy() = L"ljevon";
00058         array1.CreatedStep() = affymetrix_calvin_array::ScanningStep;
00059         array1.CreationDateTime() = L"datetime";
00060         array1.ArraySetFileIdentifier() = "id";
00061         array1.InitialProject() = L"proj1";
00062 
00063         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes().resize(1);
00064         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() = "array1-id";
00065         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayBarcode() = "123";
00066         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayName() = "name";
00067         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Comment() = L"comment goes here";
00068         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedBy() = L"me";
00069         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedStep() = JobOrderServerStep;
00070         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00071         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFile() = "master";
00072         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFileId() = "456";
00073         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Media() = PlateOrStripMedia;
00074         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaRow() = 1;
00075         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaCol() = 2;
00076         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].PatAssignment() = AffyBarcodeAssignment;
00077         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileGUID() = "mediaguid";
00078         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileName() = "mediafile";
00079         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].LibraryPackageName() = "libpackage";
00080 
00081         ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00082         ParameterNameValuePair param;
00083 
00084         param.Name = L"array-att-name-1";
00085         param.Value = L"array-att-value-1";
00086         arrayParams.push_back(param);
00087 
00088         param.Name = L"array-att-name-2";
00089         param.Value = L"array-att-value-2";
00090         arrayParams.push_back(param);
00091 
00092 
00093         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = array1.UserAttributes();
00094         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType vparam;
00095 
00096         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-1") ;
00097         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-1");
00098         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00099         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00100         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType;
00101         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear() ;
00102         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00103 
00104         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-2") ;
00105         vparam.SetValueFloat(1.0);
00106         vparam.SetDefaultValueFloat(2.0);
00107         vparam.HasDefault() = true;
00108         vparam.RequiredFlag() = true;
00109         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType;
00110         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear()  ;
00111         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00112 
00113         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-3") ;
00114         vparam.ControlMultiValues().push_back(L"one");
00115         vparam.ControlMultiValues().push_back(L"two");
00116         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00117         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00118         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType;
00119         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"one");
00120         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"two");
00121         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"three");
00122         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00123 
00124 
00125         // Write the file.
00126         const std::string TEST_FILE = "./test.file.array.xml";
00127         ArrayFileWriter writer;
00128         writer.Write(TEST_FILE, array1);
00129 
00130         // Read the file.
00131         ArrayFileReader reader;
00132         ArrayData array2;
00133         array2.Clear();
00134         reader.Read(TEST_FILE, array2);
00135 
00136 
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreatedStep() == affymetrix_calvin_array::ScanningStep);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreationDateTime() == L"datetime");
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "id");
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.InitialProject() == L"proj1");
00142 
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.DataTypeIdentifier() == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00144 
00145         // Array attributes.
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1 );
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "array1-id");
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayBarcode() == "123");
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayName() == "name");
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Comment() == L"comment goes here");
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedBy() == L"me");
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedStep() == JobOrderServerStep);
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreationDateTime() == L"now");
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFile() == "master");
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFileId() == "456");
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Media() == PlateOrStripMedia);
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaRow() == 1);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaCol() == 2);
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].PatAssignment() == AffyBarcodeAssignment);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileGUID() == "mediaguid");
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileName() == "mediafile");
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].LibraryPackageName() == "libpackage");
00163 
00164 
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().size() == 2 );
00166         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator arrayAttIt = array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().begin();
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00169         ++arrayAttIt;
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00172 
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180         // User attributes
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.UserAttributes().size() == 3 );
00182 
00183         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userAttIt = array2.UserAttributes().begin();
00184 
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-1" );
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-1" );
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00190         ++userAttIt;
00191 
00192 
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-2" );
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userAttIt).GetValueFloat(), 1, 0.0001);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userAttIt).GetDefaultValueFloat(), 2, 0.0001);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == true);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00199         ++userAttIt;
00200 
00201 
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-3" );
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlMultiValues().size() == 2 );
00206         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cIt;
00207         cIt = (*userAttIt).ControlMultiValues().begin();
00208         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"one" );
00209         ++cIt;
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"two" );
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 3 );
00212         cIt = (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"one" );
00214         ++cIt;
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"two" );
00216         ++cIt;
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"three" );
00218 
00219 }
